languages.text: {n}You hear the indignant murmur of voices and muffled curses before you register the scene before you: Marazhai, who has taken the Lord Captain's seat, is observing the crowd of officers gathered below with lazy and mocking interest. When he notices you, he unhurriedly straightens up.{/n} "My little pet. You have kept me waiting. How inconsiderate."
languages.original_text: {n}Возмущенный гул голосов и приглушенные проклятья предваряют открывшуюся вам сцену: Маражай, занявший место Лорд-капитана, с ленивым и глумливым интересом наблюдает за толпой собравшихся внизу офицеров. Заметив вас, он неторопливо выпрямляется.{/n} "Мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}. Ты заставляешь себя ждать. Неосмотрительно".

When he notices you, he unhurriedly straightens up.{/n} "My little pet. You have kept me waiting. How inconsiderate."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Возмущенный гул голосов и приглушенные проклятья предваряют открывшуюся вам сцену: Маражай, занявший место Лорд-капитана, с ленивым и глумливым интересом наблюдает за толпой собравшихся внизу офицеров. Заметив вас, он неторопливо выпрямляется.{/n} "Мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}. Ты заставляешь себя ждать. Неосмотрительно".
{n}你听到四周传来愤懑的低语与含混的咒骂，随后才看清了面前的景象。此刻，玛拉斋正大大咧咧地坐在领主舰长的位置上，面露轻蔑，慵懒地打量着聚集在下方的一众军官。看到你走近后，他慢条斯理地直起了身子。{/n}“我的小宠物，你让我好等。这就是你的不对了。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the indignant murmur of voices and muffled curses before you register the scene before you: Marazhai, who has taken the Lord Captain's seat, is observing the crowd of officers gathered below with lazy and mocking interest. When he notices you, he unhurriedly straightens up.{/n} "My little pet. You have kept me waiting. How inconsiderate."

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到四周传来愤懑的低语与含混的咒骂，随后才看清了面前的景象。此刻，玛拉斋正大大咧咧地坐在领主舰长的位置上，面露轻蔑，慵懒地打量着聚集在下方的一众军官。看到你走近后，他慢条斯理地直起了身子。{/n}“我的小宠物，你让我好等。这就是你的不对了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Oyes murmullos indignados e insultos proferidos entre dientes antes de ver la escena que tiene lugar ante tus ojos: Marazhai, que ha ocupado el asiento del Lord Capitán, observa con actitud despreocupada y burlona a la multitud de oficiales congregados en el puente. Cuando advierte tu presencia, se pone en pie sin ninguna prisa.{/n} «Mascota mía. Me has hecho esperar. Qué {mf|desconsiderado|desconsiderada}».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the indignant murmur of voices and muffled curses before you register the scene before you: Marazhai, who has taken the Lord Captain's seat, is observing the crowd of officers gathered below with lazy and mocking interest. When he notices you, he unhurriedly straightens up.{/n} "My little pet. You have kept me waiting. How inconsiderate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes murmullos indignados e insultos proferidos entre dientes antes de ver la escena que tiene lugar ante tus ojos: Marazhai, que ha ocupado el asiento del Lord Capitán, observa con actitud despreocupada y burlona a la multitud de oficiales congregados en el puente. Cuando advierte tu presencia, se pone en pie sin ninguna prisa.{/n} «Mascota mía. Me has hecho esperar. Qué {mf|desconsiderado|desconsiderada}».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez un brouhaha indigné ponctué d'injures avant de prendre la mesure de la scène qui se joue ici : Marazhai est confortablement installé dans le fauteuil de seigneur-capitaine et toise d'un air moqueur la foule d'officiers qui se tient devant lui. Quand il vous aperçoit, il se redresse avec nonchalance.{/n} « {mf|Mon brave petit|Ma brave petite} esclave. Vous m'avez fait attendre. Quel manque de considération ! »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the indignant murmur of voices and muffled curses before you register the scene before you: Marazhai, who has taken the Lord Captain's seat, is observing the crowd of officers gathered below with lazy and mocking interest. When he notices you, he unhurriedly straightens up.{/n} "My little pet. You have kept me waiting. How inconsiderate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez un brouhaha indigné ponctué d'injures avant de prendre la mesure de la scène qui se joue ici : Marazhai est confortablement installé dans le fauteuil de seigneur-capitaine et toise d'un air moqueur la foule d'officiers qui se tient devant lui. Quand il vous aperçoit, il se redresse avec nonchalance.{/n} « {mf|Mon brave petit|Ma brave petite} esclave. Vous m'avez fait attendre. Quel manque de considération ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du hörst ein entrüstetes Gemurmel aus Stimmen und unterdrückten Flüchen, bevor du folgende Szene vorfindest: Marazhai hat den Platz des Lord Captains eingenommen und beobachtet die vor sich versammelten Offiziere mit dezentem Interesse, aber auch mit einem gewissen Spott. Als er dich bemerkt, richtet er sich ohne Eile auf.{/n} "{mf|Mein gehorsamer Ergebener|Meine gehorsame Ergebene}. Ihr habt mich warten lassen. Sehr unbedacht."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the indignant murmur of voices and muffled curses before you register the scene before you: Marazhai, who has taken the Lord Captain's seat, is observing the crowd of officers gathered below with lazy and mocking interest. When he notices you, he unhurriedly straightens up.{/n} "My little pet. You have kept me waiting. How inconsiderate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst ein entrüstetes Gemurmel aus Stimmen und unterdrückten Flüchen, bevor du folgende Szene vorfindest: Marazhai hat den Platz des Lord Captains eingenommen und beobachtet die vor sich versammelten Offiziere mit dezentem Interesse, aber auch mit einem gewissen Spott. Als er dich bemerkt, richtet er sich ohne Eile auf.{/n} "{mf|Mein gehorsamer Ergebener|Meine gehorsame Ergebene}. Ihr habt mich warten lassen. Sehr unbedacht."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイがロード・キャプテンの席に座り、集まっている士官の群れをのんびりと嘲るように観察しているのにあなたが気づくより先に、憤慨したようなざわめきと罵声が聞こえてくる。彼はあなたに気付くと、慌てることなく背筋を伸ばした。{/n}「かわいいペットちゃん。待たせてくれたじゃないか。配慮が足りないんじゃないか」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the indignant murmur of voices and muffled curses before you register the scene before you: Marazhai, who has taken the Lord Captain's seat, is observing the crowd of officers gathered below with lazy and mocking interest. When he notices you, he unhurriedly straightens up.{/n} "My little pet. You have kept me waiting. How inconsiderate."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイがロード・キャプテンの席に座り、集まっている士官の群れをのんびりと嘲るように観察しているのにあなたが気づくより先に、憤慨したようなざわめきと罵声が聞こえてくる。彼はあなたに気付くと、慌てることなく背筋を伸ばした。{/n}「かわいいペットちゃん。待たせてくれたじゃないか。配慮が足りないんじゃないか」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Konuşmaların ve boğuk küfürlerin öfkeli mırıltısını duyuyor, önünde uzanan manzarayı zihnine işliyorsun. Lord Kaptan'ın koltuğuna yerleşen Marazhai, aşağıda toplanan subay grubunu miskin ve alaycı bir ilgiyle inceliyor. Seni fark ettiğindeyse telaşsız bir şekilde doğruluyor.{/n} "Minik hayvanım. Beni çok beklettin. Nasıl da düşüncesizsin."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the indignant murmur of voices and muffled curses before you register the scene before you: Marazhai, who has taken the Lord Captain's seat, is observing the crowd of officers gathered below with lazy and mocking interest. When he notices you, he unhurriedly straightens up.{/n} "My little pet. You have kept me waiting. How inconsiderate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Önünde uzanan manzarayı zihnine işlemeden önce konuşmaların ve boğuk küfürlerin öfkeli mırıltısını duyuyorsun. Lord Kaptan'ın koltuğuna yerleşen Marazhai, aşağıda toplanan subay grubunu miskin ve alaycı bir ilgiyle inceliyor. Seni fark ettiğinde telaşsız bir şekilde doğruluyor.{/n} "Minik hayvanım. Beni çok beklettin. Nasıl da düşüncesizsin."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
